pli-tv-pvr1.6:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.1: Of the four legal questions which legal question (is raised by), offences for one indulging in sexual intercourse?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.2: … Of the four legal questions it is the legal question concerning offences.
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.1: The offence of easing oneself … is, of the four legal questions which legal question?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.2: Of the four legal questions it is the legal question concerning offences.
pli-tv-pvr1.6:3.1: Concluded is the Sixth Chapter: that on Legal Questions
